titlestmt.titleproper: Ervin F. Bickley, Jr. genealogical research materials on the Iams family 1954-1997
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Ervin F. Bickley, Jr. genealogical research materials on the Iams family
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

bioghist.p: Iams family of Greene County, Pennsylvania and Frederick, Arundel Counties, Maryland - Welsh origin

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of genealogical research on the Iams family. Materials inlude: datasheets with notes from the census for Washington County, Pennsylvania; extracts from church records and other primary sources; photocopies of published sources and public records; some copies of original documents; family charts and pedigrees; correspondence related to the research; notes and documentation of the research methods; and many reports from a British genealogical firm on the progress of the research.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
